content.question: A set of bivariate data was used to create a least-squares regression line. Which of the following is minimized by the line?

choices.label: The sum of the squared residuals
The sum of the absolute values of the residuals

content.answer: The sum of the squared residuals

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Calculate summary statistics, relative positions of points within a distribution, correlation, and predicted response.
